title: Act and relating to the administration and business transferred by paragraph (1)
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Youth (Transfer of Departmental
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Youth (Transfer of Departmental 

Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 May 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited youth (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2025 (2) order come operation 1 may 2025

title: Act and relating to the administration and business transferred by paragraph (1)
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Education. 

(2) References to the Department of Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth contained in any Act or any instrument made under such 
Act and relating to the administration and business transferred by paragraph (1) 
shall, on and after the commencement of this Order, be construed as references 
to the Department of Education.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department education (2) reference department child equality disability integration youth contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department education

title: Act and relating to the administration and business transferred by paragraph (1)
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability,
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, 

Integration and Youth by or under – 

(a) 

(b) 

the Youth Work Act 2001 (No. 42 of 2001), 

subsections (1)(d) and (2) (in so far as they relate to the Young 
People’s Facilities and Services Fund) of section 2 of the 
Community, Rural and Gaeltacht Affairs (Miscellaneous 
Provisions) Act 2007 (No. 32 of 2007), and 

(c) 

section 10(1)(j) of the Education and Training Boards Act 2013 
(No. 11 of 2013), 

are transferred to the Minister for Education. 

(2) The functions vested in the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, 

Integration and Youth in relation to - 

(a) 

the funding, oversight and support for - 

(i) 

organisations that support the provision of youth work, 

(ii) youth organisations, and 

(iii) 

the youth work functions of education and training boards, 
and 

(b) 

the development and implementation of policies in relation to 
youth, youth work and related services, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 2nd May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [181] 3 

are transferred to the Minister for Education. 

(3) References to the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration 
and Youth contained in any Act or instrument made under such Act and relating 
to any functions transferred by this Article shall, on and after the commencement 
of this Order, be construed as references to the Minister for Education.

title: Act and relating to the administration and business transferred by paragraph (1)
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth is a party and the proceedings have reference to functions 
transferred by this Order to the Minister for Education, the name of the Minister 
for Education shall, in so far as the proceedings relate to any function transferred 
by this Order, be substituted in the proceedings for that of the Minister for 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth or added in the 
proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate by 
reason of such substitution.
text_norm: 4 immediately commencement order legal proceeding pending minister child equality disability integration youth party proceeding reference function transferred order minister education name minister education shall far proceeding relate function transferred order substituted proceeding minister child equality disability integration youth added proceeding may appropriate proceeding shall abate reason substitution

title: Act and relating to the administration and business transferred by paragraph (1)
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration 
and Youth may, in so far as it relates to functions transferred by this Order to the 
Minister for Education, be carried on or completed on or after such 
commencement by the Minister for Education.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister child equality disability integration youth may far relates function transferred order minister education carried completed commencement minister education

title: Act and relating to the administration and business transferred by paragraph (1)
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the exercise of a function transferred by this Order, if and in so far as it was 
operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, has effect on and 
after such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the Minister for 
Education.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made exercise function transferred order far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister education

title: Act and relating to the administration and business transferred by paragraph (1)
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration 
and Youth contained in the constitution of any company and relating to any 
function transferred by this Order shall, on and after the commencement of this 
Order, be construed as references to the Minister for Education.
text_norm: 7 reference minister child equality disability integration youth contained constitution company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister education

title: Act and relating to the administration and business transferred by paragraph (1)
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth in connection with the functions transferred by this Order 
are transferred on the commencement to the Minister for Education and, 
accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer or assignment - 

(a) 

the property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Education, 

(b) 

those rights are rights of the Minister for Education, and 

(c) 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Education. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [181] 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Education by this Article which, on the commencement of this Order, are 
standing in the name of the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth shall, on the request of the Minister for Education, be 
transferred into the name of the Minister for Education. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
 of the Government, 
29 April, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [181] 5
